Embassy of Japan, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary His Excellency
2024-09-27: Dear Sir,
This week I explained the "outline" of the "special zone". It's "wonderful". Both "il-legal immigrants" and "Americans" can be "happy". The "special zone" I propose is not a "policy" that "views" China as an enemy.
"Western countries" and others have a "weaker" economy than "China", so "they" have no choice but to "go to war" with China and "reset their economy". That's why I'm proposing it.
I think that in order to avoid a "war" between "Western countries and China", it is "urgent" to build a "special zone" in "those countries". If "they" could become "equal" in the "economic competition" with China, I think there would be no "war".
Japanese people hate war. In Japan, "damages" for "fires, etc." are "compensated" for by the "property insurance system". However, there is no "war insurance" that "compensates" for "damages" caused by "war". Japanese people hate losing prop-erty.
Trump is a wealthy man in the real estate business. If a nuclear war were to break out in America, Trump's real estate would be destroyed and he would be left penni-less. That's why he has pledged to end the Ukraine war.
Americans who don't own real estate seem to support the Ukraine war. This is be-cause they don't have any real estate to lose even if there is a nuclear war with Russia.
I think human life is more important than real estate. War is murder. If I thought I would die, I would be against the war. Didn't black people also say that black lives matter?
I think the people who support the Ukraine war are people who don't own property. People who own property are against the war because they will lose their property. People without property should move to the special zone.
"Temporary immigrants" cannot leave the "Special Zone" and go to "regular Ameri-can cities". However, it is possible for Americans to live in the "Special Zone".
The "middle class" of America does not have the "funds" to "purchase housing" in big cities such as "New York City", but in the "Special Zone", even the "middle class" can "purchase" a "home".
In "New York City", "low-income" Americans have "hard" conditions to "obtain" a "job", but in the "Special Zone", they can "easily" choose a job. And they will be "satisfied" with the "wages".
"Starting a business" in America requires "big capital". In the Special Zone, you can do business with "small capital". There are "bigger dreams" here than in "Western development".
In the "Special Zone", Americans can "challenge" with a "pioneer spirit". It's like "Western development". Young people are full of dreams. Trump should "talk" about the "American Dream" to Americans.
If Americans dream of the "American Dream", they can't "wage war". Americans don't have to like Russians, Chinese, or Arabs.
However, if we don't go to war with them, we can achieve the American Dream. Let's build a special zone.
In a CNN poll after the debate, 63% of votes went to Harris, while 37% went to Trump. Trump should "declare" the construction of a special zone on the Mexican border on immigration and economic policy, and "win." He should talk about the American Dream. !
